name: Eggs & Kings
description:
SYSYGY`s Eggs & Kings - this is an unrealistic hardcore game that will explode your computer! Grab your gamepad and a lot of patience!
You will have to destroy crowds of monsters, collecting their precious eggs. Yes, you love golden eggs, golden eggs - this is the meaning of your life!

Ready for a dynamic gameplay, a nice pixel art graphics and a quick chiptune music. Good luck!
